short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple daily to-do list extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features
Daily to-do list that resets every day
Persistent notes that carry over
Clean, distraction-free interface
Quick access to social media links
Dark mode for reduced eye strain

How It Works
Open a new tab to see your daily tasks and notes
Add, edit, or complete tasks as needed
Use the freeform notes area for longer-term planning
Enjoy a fresh start each day with pre-filled healthy habit reminders
